price: Zato ne traži da što prije stradaju, Mi im polahko dane odbrojavamo!
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
